segments.text: Some places aren't good to go.But I can show you the right bus to take . It will be no problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want to see the Statue of Liberty too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have never done that myself . But I hear it is very interesting . You two should go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have never gone to the Statue of Liberty ? ! I can't believe it ! But you live here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I'm very busy with work.And you know how it is , sometimes people don't visit the tourist sites in their own country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Are the subway trains easy to take here ?
segments.speaker: S2
